original_text: “The first was like a lion, and it had the wings of an eagle. I watched until its wings were torn off and it was lifted from the ground so that it stood on two feet like a human being, and the mind of a human was given to it.
korean_text: 첫째는 사자와 같은데 독수리의 날개가 있더니 내가 보는 중에 그 날개가 뽑혔고 또 땅에서 들려서 사람처럼 두 발로 서게 함을 받았으며 또 사람의 마음을 받았더라 또 보니

sentences.original_text: The first was like a lion
and it had the wings of an eagle
I watched until its wings were torn off
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것의 날개가 찢겨질 때까지 지켜보았고

sentences.original_text: and it was lifted from the ground
so that it stood on two feet like a human being
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그것은 인간처럼 두 발로 서게 되었고

sentences.original_text: and the mind of a human was given to it
